tool_description: Effortlessly quantify and monitor carbon footprints with our precise CO2 Emissions API
name: CO2 Emissions
title: CO2 Emissions

api_list.name: ECommerce Shipment Emissions
api_list.description: Calculate the estimated carbon footprint of an eCommerce shipment based on the transport mode, distance, and weight.

api_list.name: Flight Emissions
api_list.description: Calculate the estimated carbon footprint of a flight journey between two airports.

optional_parameters.name: startAirport
optional_parameters.description: IATA code of the departure airport.

optional_parameters.name: endAirport
optional_parameters.description: IATA code of the destination airport.

api_list.name: Hotel Stay Emissions
api_list.description: Calculate the estimated carbon footprint of a hotel stay.
